name: Vymazání fáze řešení po zrušení úkolu, zasláno změna Phase bez value
description:
Po zrušení úkolu došlo ke změnám i Phase, ale daná změna neobsahuje Value

Luboš

comments.creator: Lubomír Bednář
comments.comment: a pokud se nevolá simple, tak to dopadne ještě hůře: volám: {"company":"a069077mrg06rn","lasttranId":"a06frhjsl01ig4","limit":5,"simpleResult":"false "} vrací se { "iserror": false, "isrepeatable": false, "lasttranid": "a06frhoeg01ig4", "moredata": false, "trans": [ { "tranid": "a06frhoeg01ig4", "ts": "2024-10-01T12:07:01Z", "usercompany": "a069077msg06rn", "changes": [ { "type": "Modify", "simple": false, "def": "Task", "id": "a06c8feqj00f77", "eid": "279", "Done": "Solving" } ] } ] } volání v simple: {"company":"a069077mrg06rn","lasttranId":"a06frhjsl01ig4","limit":5,"simpleResult":"true "} vrací se { "iserror": false, "isrepeatable": false, "lasttranid": "a06frhoeg01ig4", "moredata": false, "trans": [ { "tranid": "a06frhoeg01ig4", "ts": "2024-10-01T12:07:01Z", "usercompany": "a069077msg06rn", "changes": [ { "type": "Modify", "simple": true, "def": "Task", "id": "a06c8feqj00f77", "eid": "279", "fields": [ { "name": "Done", "type": "Enum", "value": "Solving" }, { "name": "CloseDate", "type": "DateTime", "value": "1901-01-01T00:00:00.000Z" }, { "name": "CloseUser", "type": "UserCompany" }, { "name": "CloseRequestDate", "type": "DateTime", "value": "1901-01-01T00:00:00.000Z" }, { "name": "CloseRequestUser", "type": "UserCompany" } ] } ] } ] } tedy v nesimple vypadne vymazání polí CloseDate, CloseDate, CloseRequestDate, CloseRequestUser to ne dobré
